Name: Perfect Plan
About the game: Perfect Plan is a single-player first person shooting game. The game based on a simple plot of two pals Tom & Bill planning to steal a multi million dollar formula. However, their path are riddled with many obstacles and challenges to overcome. Playing as Tom character, your aim is to survive these challenges while your partner in crime Billy guide you through. Will you be able to execute the perfect plan or succumb to the attacks of many enemies trying to stop you? Cut scenes and story Beautiful artstyle 21 level full of enemies Short and Fun music used : Broken Reality Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License /
